dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1957 IH: State Licensing Efficiency Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Feinstein (for herself, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Cotton, Mrs. Capito, Mr. Leahy, Mr. Merkley, and Mr. Crapo) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To require the Attorney General to provide State officials with access to criminal history information with respect to certain financial service providers required to undergo State criminal background checks, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Licensing Efficiency Act of 2015.
Section 1511(a) of the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 (12 U.S.C. 5110(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting and other financial service providers after State-licensed loan originators; and
by inserting or other financial service providers before the period at the end.
